title: Perform Gowning Qualification
description: A new employee must demonstrate proper aseptic gowning technique to be qualified to enter a cleanroom.

tasks.description: Observe the employee perform the gowning procedure.
tasks.expected_outcome: A qualified trainer observes the employee.

tasks.description: Compare the employee's technique against the official SOP for gowning.
tasks.expected_outcome: The trainer confirms the employee followed all steps correctly.

tasks.description: Document the successful completion of the gowning qualification in the employee's training file.
tasks.expected_outcome: The trainer signs off on the qualification record in the training management system.
